VET  June so far..  *OceanEx withdraw limit for non-KYC changed "Just in time" - Sunny Lu🤔 *PwC Symposium on Wednesday *Long Hash on Thursday *PwC x VeChain x Partner Announcement (judging from what was said at the Summit)  $BTC $ETH $EOS $ADA $OCE $SHA #Crypto

$ADA #CARDANO  At this point we're still making higher lows & in the trend upwards on the ADA/BTC pair.  Next to that we've flipped 1050 as support here, so as long as we keep that range, a retest of the 1200 area is likely to happen.  https://t.co/L86lgyE9fd

[Notice] ADA (Cardano) deposit & withdrawal have been temporary closed due to some network connection issue from the Cardano wallet. We are expecting it to resume by end of today. Sorry for the inconvenience this has caused.

I'll be buying the dip for $ADA, $LTC, and $XRP. Only interested in majors to swing for the most part.  Mid Caps to Low Caps are still only for flipping in my opinion.   I believe we're quite far from a legitimate "alt season" but I'm happy to be wrong on that one.

#Cardano - one of the first crypto’s I ever invested in. Looking forward to the launch of the Shelley Network! The testnet to allow users to have a “mainnet-like experience.” #HODL 🚀 @IOHK_Charles #cryptocurrency  https://t.co/NdFhzL9DKo

There was also a $WTC vs #Supplychain projects question too. Interesting for all the #crypto investors in this space. I *thought* Waltonchain had a technical advantage, but now I *know* they do.
